section: *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal
explanation: The description of BorrowMoney.com, inc's duties is vague and lacks specificity. It is unclear what 'HTML code' entails, the exact nature of 'technical aspect requirements,' and the scope of 'medical dispatch personal & product service.' The phrase 'as needed' further contributes to the ambiguity. It doesn't clearly define the deliverables or the level of service expected. In addition, there are grammatical errors in the description. This lack of clarity could lead to disputes regarding the scope of BorrowMoney.com, inc's responsibilities.

section: $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: This section is ambiguous and structurally flawed. It's unclear whether the $60,000 is a fixed contribution from the contracts, or a target to be reached, or a projection. The phrase 'From Monthly Government, City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts' is grammatically incorrect and doesn't clearly define the source of the funds. It does not clearly state if the $60,000 is from all the contracts or each individual contract. In addition, it is not clear as to what awarded contract the 10% is referring to.

section: 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty*
explanation: This description lacks clarity and completeness. The phrase 'Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty*' is unclear and doesn't adequately describe the office space being contributed. The word 'Includingspecified' is not a valid word, and the phrase 'Description of duty*' ends abruptly, leaving the sentence incomplete. It's impossible to determine what duties are included with the office space.

section: Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members, provided that the Members' interests are not affected except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
explanation: This section has an ambiguity in the text. A 'decision of the members' isn't defined if it means a majority vote or a unanimous vote. If it is a majority vote, then the Members' interests are affected if duties are being amended. This creates ambiguity in the meaning of how Duties of Members can be changed.

section:
Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"):

Member Contribution Description Agreed Value
BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD
JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: This creates an inconsistencies in text. BorrowMoney.com, inc is contributing 1,500 square feet of office space and JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go is contributing government contracts, yet both are assigned a value of $3,500,000.00 USD. This is inconsistent as both contributions should not be of the same value.

section: The funds of the Venture will be placed in such investments and banking accounts as will be designated by the Members.
explanation: This section has ambiguity in the text. There is no information on how the Members will designate the such investments and banking accounts. It doesn't define if the 'designation' means a majority vote or unanimous vote. This creates an ambiguity in the meaning of how Venture funds are placed.
